head.title: A New Role for a Gates Sibling

hedline.hl1: A New Role for a Gates Sibling

abstract.p: Avista, Spokane, Wash, gas and electric utility, names Kristianne Gates Blake, sister of Microsoft chmn Bill Gates, to its board of directors; Gates acquired 5 percent stake in Avista in November 1999 (S)

block.p: Kristianne Gates Blake is stepping ever so slightly out of the shadow of her brother Bill. Last week, Ms. Blake, 46, an accountant and author of two books on personal finance, was appointed to the board of Avista, a gas and electric utility in Spokane, Wash., where she lives. ''Her standing here locally is very well known,'' said Steve Becket, an Avista spokesman. ''Everyone in that family is very active and involved in this region and they tend to get overlooked because of one family member.''
